snippet.title: The Church in the Darkness - Coming August 2
snippet.description:
JOIN US ON AUGUST 2.

The Church in the Darkness is coming to NINTENDO SWITCH, Steam, Xbox One, and Playstation 4.

ABOUT THE GAME
The year is 1977. Your nephew has joined a religious cult and moved with them to the South American jungle to found Freedom Town. It's up to you to sneak into the commune, find out what's really going on, and decide if you need to get your nephew out.

Infiltrate the compound and investigate the people within. The scenario changes each time you play, and every time you must determine just how dangerous the leaders Rebecca and Isaac, are. Is this a socialist utopia or an oppressive prison?
